item.title: Beta Test de Ardium
item.author: invalid@example.com (CashBanks)
item.dc:creator: Saildrag
item.content:encoded:
13 NOVEMEBER 2021​
As you might've read in the latest Summer Edition of the Rookery we are planning to mark 10 years of WesterosCraft this November 13th.

We want this to be celebration of everything this community's achieved over these years, and like with everything this server achieves it will need your help to do it!

It's hoped that the anniversary will involve:
  • New videos;
  • Reunions with old builders;​
  • Mini-games;​
  • Building contests;​
  • Guided tours; and​
  • New project announcements.​
/warp anniversary have been setup as a hub for anniversary activities. You can already take a monorail tour of the WIP map of Westeros.



Like with our usual Christmas/Halloween areas you can feel free to build things to celebrate the history of the server (museum exhibits/rides/statues/trivia etc).

What Westeros needs from you:
  • Your involvement. This won't be fun without your support and enthusiasm!​
  • Your ideas. Use this thread to suggest ideas for anniversary activities, or just start building them at /warp anniversary​
  • Your contacts. We want to get the word out to as many old builders and visitors as we can. If you have any connections with former builders it would be great if you could get the word out to them that we'll want them back. We'll hopefully do a mail out to all forum members with the key details.​
  • Your filmmaking skills/ideas. A big anniversary video is a no-brainer, but what it actually looks like and features is something we could use your help and ideas on. Get in touch if you would like to contribute.​
  • And hey if you wanted to plan a Sunspear server build to launch on the anniversary, THAT would really be swell.​
10 years holy shit, let's make it a big one.

item.title: Titre
item.author: Auteur
item.dc:creator: Auteur
item.content:encoded:
13 NOVEMEBER 2021​
As you might've read in the latest Summer Edition of the Rookery we are planning to mark 10 years of WesterosCraft this November 13th.

We want this to be celebration of everything this community's achieved over these years, and like with everything this server achieves it will need your help to do it!

  • New videos;

  • Guided tours; and​
  • New project announcements.​
/warp anniversary have been setup as a hub for anniversary activities. You can already take a monorail tour of the WIP map of Westeros.



Like with our usual Christmas/Halloween areas you can feel free to build things to celebrate the history of the server (museum exhibits/rides/statues/trivia etc).

What Westeros needs from you:

  • Your ideas. Use this thread to suggest ideas for anniversary activities, or just start building them at /warp anniversary​
  • Your contacts. We want to get the word out to as many old builders and visitors as we can. If you have any connections with former builders it would be great if you could get the word out to them that we'll want them back. We'll hopefully do a mail out to all forum members with the key details.​
